name: popphp/popphp
description: Pop PHP Framework, a lightweight, robust PHP framework

suggest.popphp/pop-acl: For creating and managing an access control list
suggest.popphp/pop-cache: For cache management via PHP cache tools such as memcache and APC
suggest.popphp/pop-crypt: For creating encrypted hash strings and comparing and verifying them
suggest.popphp/pop-data: For converting data between different types, SQL, CSV, XML, etc
suggest.popphp/pop-file: For file uploads and directory traversing
suggest.popphp/pop-form: For HTML form generation and validation
suggest.popphp/pop-log: For logging various messages at different triggered times
suggest.popphp/pop-mail: For managing and sending mail via PHP
suggest.popphp/pop-nav: For generating HTML navigation objects with ACL support
suggest.popphp/pop-paginator: For paginator of large sets of data
suggest.popphp/pop-web: For web extra, like sessions, cookies and mobile redirects
